info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 4:36PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Jefferson County through 515 PM CDT... At 436 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Port Arthur to near High Island. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Arthur and Sea Rim State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
